vernac_cmds: Lemma finite_bases_always_equally_big : forall (n : Nat) (beta : basis V), has_n_elements n beta -> forall Sset : part_set V, lin_indep Sset -> has_n_elements n Sset -> is_basis Sset.
generalize (p _ _ _ _ H); clear p; intro p.
clear H3; intro H3; inversion_clear H3.
generalize (H7 I); clear H7 H8; intro H3; inversion_clear H3.
apply generates_comp with (union Sset (inject_subsets x)) (full V); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (union Sset (inject_subsets (empty beta))); auto with algebra.
apply Trans with (union Sset (empty V)); auto with algebra.
Lemma finite_basis_bounds_lin_indep_set_size : forall (n : Nat) (beta : basis V), has_n_elements n beta -> forall Sset : part_set V, has_at_least_n_elements (S n) Sset -> lin_dep Sset.
assert (exists S1 : part_set V, included S1 Sset /\ has_n_elements n S1).
apply in_part_comp_l with (Map_embed (Seqtl x) x0); auto with algebra.
simpl in |- *; red in |- *; simpl in |- *.
destruct i; destruct j; simpl in |- *.
apply (H2 (Build_finiteT (lt_n_S index n in_range_prf)) (Build_finiteT (lt_n_S index0 n in_range_prf0))); auto with algebra.
apply lin_indep_include with Sset; auto with algebra.
assert (exists x : V, in_part x Sset /\ ~ in_part x S1).
apply has_extra_element_strong with n (S n); auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with (full V); auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_l with x; auto with algebra.
apply lin_dep_include with (union S1 (single x)); auto with algebra.
Lemma finite_basis_bounds_lin_indep_set_size' : forall (n : Nat) (beta : basis V), has_n_elements n beta -> forall Sset : part_set V, lin_indep Sset -> has_at_most_n_elements n Sset.
intro p; generalize (p Sset); clear p; intro p.
Lemma all_finite_bases_equally_big : forall (n : Nat) (beta : basis V), has_n_elements n beta -> forall Sset : basis V, has_n_elements n Sset.
intro p; generalize (p Sset); clear p; intro p.
apply (H6 _ _ _ H7 _ _ H); auto with algebra.

command: assert (exists S1 : part_set V, included S1 Sset /\ has_n_elements n S1).
apply in_part_comp_l with (Map_embed (Seqtl x) x0); auto with algebra.
simpl in |- *; red in |- *; simpl in |- *.
destruct i; destruct j; simpl in |- *.
apply (H2 (Build_finiteT (lt_n_S index n in_range_prf)) (Build_finiteT (lt_n_S index0 n in_range_prf0))); auto with algebra.
apply lin_indep_include with Sset; auto with algebra.
assert (exists x : V, in_part x Sset /\ ~ in_part x S1).
apply has_extra_element_strong with n (S n); auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_r with (full V); auto with algebra.
apply in_part_comp_l with x; auto with algebra.
apply lin_dep_include with (union S1 (single x)); auto with algebra.
intro p; generalize (p Sset); clear p; intro p.
intro p; generalize (p Sset); clear p; intro p.
apply (H6 _ _ _ H7 _ _ H); auto with algebra.
